p: 31. Line 101-103 of page 5, “In an attempt to better utilize G. lucidum resources, the simultaneous extraction of polysaccharides and triterpenoids was examined using ultrasound technology in this work” was revised as “In the present study, the ultrasonic-assisted co-extraction (UACE) of polysaccharides and triterpenoids was evaluated using ultrasound technology as an attempt to better utilize G. lucidum”.
